creationTime.description: When the replication configuration was created.

originalSourceFileSystemArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the original source Amazon EFS file system in the replication configuration.

sourceFileSystemArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the current source file system in the replication configuration.

sourceFileSystemId.description: The ID of the file system that is to be replicated.

sourceFileSystemRegion.description:
The AWS Region in which the source Amazon EFS file system is located.
* `destination[0].file_system_id` - The fs ID of the replica.
* `destination[0].status` - The status of the replication.

sourceFileSystemId.description: The ID of the file system that is to be replicated.
